content.rendered:
Directed by Tom Emmatty.

Written by Jude Anthany Joseph.

Cast Tovino Thomas(Paul Varghese / Kochaniyan). Neeraj Madhav(Subhash). Roopesh Peethambaran(Roopesh). Manesh Krishnan(Krishnan (as Manu)). Jino John(Kanchan). Vishnu Govindhan(Jomey). Gayathri Suresh(Anu). Kalabhavan Shajohn(Shiyaz). Hareesh Peradi(Comrade). Subeesh Sudhi(Rajesh). Sarath Chandran(Rohit) . Anas Haneef(Joji). Jaffer Idukki(Jose). Lijo Jose(Politician). Sudheer Karamana(Professor). Nanda Kishore(College Principal). Sudhi Koppa(Monappan). Megha Mathew(Aardra).Anjali P. Nair.Ajay Natraj. Praveen Premnath(Hippie beating drums in the Song ‘Emanmare Emanmare’). Balaji Sarma(Sunil). Anwar Shereef(Anwar). Sunil Sukhada(Professor (Cameo)). Jayaraj Warrier(Self – Kalolsavam Guest)

Language Malayalam.

Producers Anoop Kannan. Linto Thomas.

Production Anoop Kannan Production.
